description: Everytime an InstanceNotFound exception is raised in compute manager, it logs an ERROR containing a stack trace from the amqp call. We should just log a warning that an instance could not be found.
title: InstanceNotFound exceptions should not log stack traces in compute logs

comments.content: Everytime an InstanceNotFound exception is raised in compute manager, it logs an ERROR containing a stack trace from the amqp call. We should just log a warning that an instance could not be found.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~alex-meade

    instead of throwing exeptions.
    
    fixes bug 933012
